Experience.title: Data Analyst / Back-end Engineer
Experience.description:
- Develop API’s authentication with Laravel to increase the security of user’s personal information (ex. name, phone number, etc)
- Develop the authentication of logging in with apple id
- Research & build Siamese Network & Proto-typical Network with PyTorch
- Analyze the data of mobile phone’s Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensors by visualizing them with Matplotlib to enhance the accuracy of the feedback on users’ movements given by our app

Experience.title: Research Assistant, Department of Economics
Experience.description:
- The goal of this research is to save the government’s expense on human resource doing field study of commodity’s market price to calculate the yearly CPI (Consumer Price Index) of Taiwan.
- Use Random Forest model to label the unlabeled data in the database for inferring the formula of calculating the CPI of Taiwan from 100,000,000+ everyday electronic invoice data with Python & PostgreSQL
- In result, produced the first prototype of the formula.
